channel.title: Comments on: Corona Geek #94 – Apple App Store Changes, Composer GUI Beta Updates, and World Cup Open API

item.title: By: Charles McKeever
item.dc:creator: Charles McKeever
item.description:
Thanks ToeKnee. Sounds like we might need to host a dedicated panel discussion on the topic.
I'll have to add Gladiator to my Netflix queue now :)
item.content:encoded:
Thanks ToeKnee. Sounds like we might need to host a dedicated panel discussion on the topic.

I’ll have to add Gladiator to my Netflix queue now ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: ToeKnee
item.dc:creator: ToeKnee
item.description:
I agree with Ed's view on the bundle thing. When i first heard about it and how it was reported as positively received- first thing to come to mind was a quote from "Gladiator".
Falco: You really think people are going to be seduced by that? Gracchus: I think he knows what Rome is. Rome is the mob. Conjure magic for them and they'll be distracted. Take away their freedom and still they'll roar. The beating heart of Rome is not the marble of the senate, it's the sand of the coliseum. He'll bring them death - and they will love him for it.
It's quite a complicated scenario - and you should consider a more in-depth discussion on the topic.
item.content:encoded:
I agree with Ed’s view on the bundle thing.
When i first heard about it and how it was reported as positively received- first thing to come to mind was a quote from “Gladiator”.

Falco: You really think people are going to be seduced by that?
Gracchus: I think he knows what Rome is. Rome is the mob. Conjure magic for them and they’ll be distracted. Take away their freedom and still they’ll roar. The beating heart of Rome is not the marble of the senate, it’s the sand of the coliseum. He’ll bring them death – and they will love him for it.

It’s quite a complicated scenario – and you should consider a more in-depth discussion on the topic.
